'''Lanthir Lamath''', the "Waterfall of Echoing Voices"<ref>{{S|Index}}</ref>, was the shimmering, glittering waterfall that ran beside the house of [[Dior|Dior Eluch√≠l]] in [[Ossiriand]]. It was probably part of the stream of the River [[Adurant]]. 

Lanthir Lamath was most famous for inspiring the name of Dior's daughter [[Elwing]], whose name - meaning 'Star-spray' - was inspired by the falling water on the night of stars when she was born.<ref>{{S|22}}</ref>
==Etymology==
''Lanthir Lamath'' is [[Sindarin]] for "Waterfall of Echoing Voices", from ''[[lamthir]]'' ("waterfall") + plural ''[[lam]]'' ("echo").<ref>{{HM|PM}}, p. 349</ref>
